name: Astro Ball
description:
Survive and earn points for as long as you can! Earn multipliers by staying airborne and launching into bumpers, and make sure to avoid the deadly lava.

CONTROLS (Mouse recommend)

Steer the ball using WASD/Mouse/Left analog stick

Launch the ball using Space/Left click/X button

Music: https://context-sensitive.com/

Sound effects created with BFXR: https://www.bfxr.net/
